tokens.text: validates script module dependencies and versions

title: Script Modules
description: Validates script module dependencies in behavior pack manifests and package.json files. Checks for version compatibility and can update module versions to the latest supported versions.

fields.title: BP Module Dependency
fields.description: Reports a script module dependency declared in a behavior pack manifest. Shows the module name and version being used.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the version string. Content field contains the module name.

fields.title: Package Dependency
fields.description: Reports a @minecraft/* package dependency in package.json. Shows the package name and version used for TypeScript development.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the version string. Content field contains the package name.

fields.title: Package Dev Dependency
fields.description: Reports a @minecraft/* package devDependency in package.json. Shows the package name and version used for development tooling.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the version string. Content field contains the package name.

fields.title: Missing Package Registration
fields.description: A script module is used in the behavior pack manifest but not registered in package.json. Add the dependency to package.json.
fields.howToUse: Run 'npm install @minecraft/[module-name]' to add the missing module to package.json, or manually add it to dependencies.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the module name that is missing from package.json.

fields.title: Missing NPM Registration
fields.description: A script module is used but could not be found in the NPM registry. Check if the module name is correct.
fields.howToUse: Verify the module name is spelled correctly. Check the NPM registry or Minecraft documentation for valid @minecraft/* package names.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the module name that could not be found.

fields.title: Beta Version Outdated
fields.description: The beta version of a script module is outdated compared to the current beta version. Update to the latest beta.
fields.howToUse: Update to the latest beta version by running 'npm update @minecraft/[module-name]@beta' or use the 'Fix' button.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the outdated version string.
